student_life.title: Student Life at NIET Business School
student_life.description: NIET Business School offers a vibrant ecosystem where learning continues well beyond classrooms. From clubs and committees to sports, fests, and social initiatives, every experience on campus is designed to build confidence, leadership, and a strong sense of community. Students collaborate on live projects, manage student-led events, participate in competitions, and engage with industry leaders on campus. These experiences help them sharpen problem-solving, team-working, and communication skills while creating memories that last a lifetime.

facilities.title: In-house Counsellor
facilities.description: Professional counseling services available on campus to support students' mental health, academic performance, and personal development throughout their journey.

facilities.title: Sports Facilities
facilities.description: State-of-the-art sports infrastructure including indoor and outdoor facilities for various sports activities, promoting physical fitness and team spirit among students.

facilities.title: Library & Learning Resources
facilities.description: Well-equipped library with extensive collection of books, journals, and digital resources to support academic excellence and research.

facilities.title: Hostel Facilities
facilities.description: Comfortable and secure hostel accommodation with modern amenities, creating a home away from home for students.

facilities.title: Cafeteria & Dining
facilities.description: Hygienic and nutritious food options available in the campus cafeteria, catering to diverse dietary preferences and requirements.

facilities.title: Medical Facilities
facilities.description: On-campus medical center with qualified healthcare professionals providing first-aid and basic medical care for students' health and wellness.
